nodes.description: 索马里首都附近工地发生自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，造成至少2人死亡、20余人受伤
nodes.support_text: At least two people have been killed and more than 20 wounded as a suicide car bomber targeted a construction site along a major road outside Somalia’s capital, police said.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致6名土耳其公民受伤，其中2人情况危重
nodes.support_text: Six Turkish nationals were among the wounded, with two in serious condition, Turkey’s health minister Fahrettin Koca said.

nodes.description: 索马里警方确认袭击目标为正在施工的土耳其建筑工人
nodes.support_text: Somali police Colonel Abdi Abdullahi said. The Turkish construction workers appeared to be the bomber’s target.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生时现场有索马里警察保护土耳其工人施工
nodes.support_text: Most of the casualties were police officers providing security for the Turkish workers constructing a highway between capital Mogadishu and the agricultural town of Afgoye, 18 miles north.

edges.support_text: At least two people have been killed and more than 20 wounded as a suicide car bomber targeted a construction site along a major road outside Somalia’s capital, police said.
Somali police Colonel Abdi Abdullahi said. The Turkish construction workers appeared to be the bomber’s target.
Most of the casualties were police officers providing security for the Turkish workers constructing a highway between capital Mogadishu and the agricultural town of Afgoye, 18 miles north.
Six Turkish nationals were among the wounded, with two in serious condition, Turkey’s health minister Fahrettin Koca said.
